%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.label: TextBlock12
%vlocity_namespace%__PropertySet__c.text:
Thank you for your interest in becoming a Participating Contractor in the Con Edison Commercial & Industrial Energy Efficiency program  

Before you begin with the registration please make sure you read, understand and are able to comply with the program’s Participating Contractor Agreement. 

For the purpose of registering your company as Participating Contractor (PC) in the C&I program, you must submit the following supporting documents: 

Company signed copy of latest IRS W9 version

  • Note the company applying to become a PC must be the same company receiving incentive payments should the customer assign incentive to the PC 

Copy of Certificate of Insurance & Copy of Workers Compensation Certificate

  • Certificate of Insurance & Workers Compensation Certificate must comply with Participating Contractor Agreement, section named Insurance 
  • List CECONY Inc. 4 Irving Pl, New York, NY 10003 as an additional insurer under Certificate Holder section 

Please do not proceed if you do not have the necessary documents ready to be uploaded 

  • Upload all of your documents on the Acknowledgement and Attachment page at the end of your registration.

Note that the registration page consists of two actions:  

  • Required information regarding your company 
  • Uploading supporting documents
  • W9
  • Certificate of Insurance
  • Workers Compensation Certificate
  • Company Logo 

Apart from completing the registration to become a Participating Contractor in the C&I program, it is also required that the applicant submit at least one project to the program to be approved as a C&I Participating Contractor.
